cmp: 支 ((a measure word)/to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money)
mng: branch, classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc

exm.mng: spray (sprig of a plant with blossoms), squid (on dining menus), (literary) beautiful woman
litchi or lychee fruit (Litchi chinensis Sonn.)
golden branch, jade leaves (idiom); fig. blue-blooded nobility, esp. imperial kinsmen or peerless beauty
Panzhihua prefecture-level city in the south of Sichuan
